data.title: Vitalii K. on LinkedIn: Today is an important day in my career. I hit three years mark at Apple's…
data.meta_description: Today is an important day in my career. I hit three years mark at Apple's Human Interface design team – one of the best design teams in the world. I'm… | 39 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Dear Tech Community, I urge you to support the initiative below to stop the war in Ukraine. Please do the following: 1. share this post with the leadership of your companies 2. add more ideas in the comments 3. share and repost. Companies that already acted: Meta, Google, Twitter, Intel Corporation, YouTube, SpaceX, Reface, PayPal, Cloudflare. What about you Oracle, TikTok, Netflix, Atlassian, Apple, Tesla, Twitter, Shopify, Uber, Zendesk, Amazon, Salesforce, Autodesk? #stoprussia #helpukraine

Exciting news for Sharing Technologies at Apple! We are hiring for several roles: - FaceTime Networking Framework Engineer - Sharing and Proximity Networking Framework Engineer - Tools & Automation Software Engineer - Sharing Technologies You can find the full job descriptions by searching on https://jobs.apple.com If you're interested or would like to refer someone, please reach out to me directly: dpollack@apple.com Please like and reshare to help us fill these roles quickly, improve quality, and add more features like FaceTime, iMessage, AirDrop, AutoUnlock, Handoff, magic device setup! (For those who know more about Apple's job levels: thanks to our team's inherent cross-functional nature, these roles are great for all levels: new college grads learning to be professional software engineers, ICT3s learning to be leads, ICT4s looking to expand their influence to achieve promotion to ICT5, and ICT5s looking to impact teams across the entire company. We've had great success with senior promotions!)
